generic <typename T> public ref class ArrayPool abstract

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 資源集區中的物件型別。

span.span: The type of the objects that are in the resource pool.

summary.span: 提供可以重複使用類型 執行個體的資源集區。

span.span: Provides a resource pool that enables reusing instances of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用出租，並傳回緩衝區的類別 (使用和方法) 可以改善效能，在其中建立和終結經常陣列的情況下，而導致嚴重的記憶體壓力的記憶體回收收集器。Using the class to rent and return buffers (using the and methods) can improve performance in situations where arrays are created and destroyed frequently, resulting in significant memory pressure on the garbage collector.

threadsafe.span: 這個類別是安全執行緒。

span.span: This class is thread-safe.

threadsafe.span: 可能由多個執行緒同時使用所有成員。

span.span: All members may be used by multiple threads concurrently.

param.name: maxArrayLength
param.span: 可儲存在集區的陣列執行個體長度上限。

span.span: The maximum length of an array instance that may be stored in the pool.

param.name: maxArraysPerBucket
param.span: 可儲存在集區各貯體的陣列執行個體數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of array instances that may be stored in each bucket in the pool.

param.span: 集區會將長度類似的陣列分組到不同的貯體，以加速存取。

span.span: The pool groups arrays of similar lengths into buckets for faster access.

summary.span: 使用指定的組態建立新的 類別執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class using the specifed configuration.

returns.span: 具有指定組態的新 類別執行個體。

span.span: A new instance of the class with the specified configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體這個方法所建立的類別將會分組陣列至貯體，含多個`maxArraysPerBucket`中每個貯體，以及與那些陣列未超過`maxArrayLength`的長度。The instance of the class created by this method will group arrays into buckets, with no more than `maxArraysPerBucket` in each bucket, and with those arrays not exceeding `maxArrayLength` in length.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract T[] Rent (int minimumLength);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !T[] Rent(int32 minimumLength) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Rent (minimumLength As Integer) As T()
public: abstract cli::array <T> ^ Rent(int minimumLength);
abstract member Rent : int -> 'T[]

span.span: The minimum length of the array.

summary.span: 擷取至少為要求長度的緩衝區。

span.span: Retrieves a buffer that is at least the requested length.

returns.span: 類型的陣列，長度至少是 。

span.span: An array of type that is at least in length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個緩衝區借貸給呼叫者，應該會返回相同的集區使用方法，所以它可以在後續呼叫重複使用方法。This buffer is loaned to the caller and should be returned to the same pool using the method, so that it can be reused in subsequent calls to the method. 要傳回的出租的緩衝區的失敗不是嚴重的錯誤。Failure to return a rented buffer is not a fatal error. 不過，它可能會導致降低的應用程式效能，因為集區可能需要建立新的緩衝區來取代遺失。However, it may lead to decreased application performance, as the pool may need to create a new buffer to replace the lost one.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Return (T[] array, bool clearArray = false);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Return(!T[] array, bool clearArray) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Return (array As T(), Optional clearArray As Boolean = false)
abstract member Return : 'T[] * bool -> unit

param.name: array
param.span: 要傳回集區的緩衝區，它先前是使用 方法取得。

span.span: A buffer to return to the pool that was previously obtained using the method.

param.name: clearArray
param.span: 指出是否應該先清除緩衝區內容再重複使用。

span.span: Indicates whether the contents of the buffer should be cleared before reuse.

param.span: 如果 設為 ，且集區會儲存緩衝區以便後續能夠重複使用，則 方法會清除其內容的 ，不讓後續使用 方法的呼叫者看到前一位呼叫者的內容。

span.span: If is set to , and if the pool will store the buffer to enable subsequent reuse, the method will clear the of its contents so that a subsequent caller using the method will not see the content of the previous caller.

param.span: 如果 設為 或集區會釋出緩衝區，則陣列的內容保持不變。

span.span: If is set to or if the pool will release the buffer, the array's contents are left unchanged.

summary.span: 將先前使用 方法在相同的 執行個體上取得的陣列傳回集區。

span.span: Returns an array to the pool that was previously obtained using the method on the same instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當緩衝區已傳回集區中時，呼叫端就會放棄所有的擁有權的緩衝區，而且不能使用它。Once a buffer has been returned to the pool, the caller gives up all ownership of the buffer and must not use it. 從指定的呼叫所傳回的參考方法必須只傳回使用方法一次。The reference returned from a given call to the method must only be returned using the method once. 預設值可能保存到傳回的緩衝區上以租用一次，或它可能會釋放傳回的緩衝區如果它由決定集區已經有足夠的緩衝區儲存。The default may hold onto the returned buffer in order to rent it again, or it may release the returned buffer if it's determined that the pool already has enough buffers stored.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Buffers.ArrayPool<T> Shared { get; }
.property class System.Buffers.ArrayPool`1<!T> Shared
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Shared As ArrayPool(Of T)
public: static property System::Buffers::ArrayPool<T> ^ Shared { System::Buffers::ArrayPool<T> ^ get(); };
member this.Shared : System.Buffers.ArrayPool<'T>

summary.span: 取得共用的 執行個體。

span.span: Gets a shared instance.
A shared instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共用的集區提供的預設實作類別，以供一般適用性。The shared pool provides a default implementation of the class that's intended for general applicability. 共用的類別會維護多個大小的陣列，並可能會交回較大型的陣列不實際要求，但它將永遠不會送回小於所要求的較小的陣列。A shared class maintains arrays of multiple sizes, and may hand back a larger array than was actually requested, but it will never hand back a smaller array than was requested. 從共用的類別使用的緩衝區租借方法將會導致現有的緩衝區，如果適當的緩衝區可供新的緩衝區中如果有一個配置不提供或進行從集區。Renting a buffer from a shared class using the method will result in an existing buffer being taken from the pool if an appropriate buffer is available or in a new buffer being allocated if one is not available.
